<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint32&#95;t OldData = 0; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; NumBytes; i++) OldData |=</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              (InstAddr&#91;i&#93; &lt;&lt; (i &#42; 8)) &amp; (0xff &lt;&lt; (i &#42; 8));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\tBValue=0x&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a37b5dd8a8b82f2818e0f4ea9699d8ae5">write&#95;hex</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;: AValue=0x&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a37b5dd8a8b82f2818e0f4ea9699d8ae5">write&#95;hex</a>(FixupValue)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;: Offset=&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;: Size=&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>.size() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;: OInst=0x&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a37b5dd8a8b82f2818e0f4ea9699d8ae5">write&#95;hex</a>(OldData) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;: Reloc=0x&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a37b5dd8a8b82f2818e0f4ea9699d8ae5">write&#95;hex</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/reloc">Reloc</a>););</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each byte of the fragment that the fixup touches, mask in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bits from the fixup value. The Value has been &quot;split up&quot; into the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// appropriate bitfields above.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; NumBytes; i++)&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">      InstAddr&#91;i&#93; &amp;= uint8&#95;t(~InstMask &gt;&gt; (i &#42; 8)) &amp; 0xff; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Clear reloc bits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">      InstAddr&#91;i&#93; |= uint8&#95;t(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/reloc">Reloc</a> &gt;&gt; (i &#42; 8)) &amp; 0xff;     </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Apply new reloc</span></CodeLine>
